# Preferences Settings
!["Preferences"](https://daily-now-res.cloudinary.com/image/upload/v1724399519/docs-v2/699dcb1d-8bcc-481f-8ef3-3f2cbc80b15f.png)
The preferences options allow you to fine-tune your **daily.dev** experience by toggling various features on or off. Currently, available options include:

translations.zh-CN: 通过偏好设置选项，您可以通过开启或关闭各项功能来微调**daily.dev**的使用体验。当前可配置选项包括：

segments.source_content:
- Show reading streaks
- Open links in a new tab
- Show custom shortcuts
- Show feed sorting menu
- Enable companion

translations.zh-CN:
- 显示阅读连续天数
- 在新标签页打开链接
- 显示自定义快捷方式
- 显示内容流排序菜单
- 启用伴侣组件

segments.source_content: ### Accessibility
- Automatically dismiss notifications
## Show Reading Streaks
By default, daily.dev displays your reading streaks in the top right corner of your feed. If you’d prefer to hide your reading streaks, set the `Show reading streaks` toggle switch to `off`.

translations.zh-CN: 默认情况下，daily.dev会在内容流右上角显示您的阅读连续天数。如需隐藏该数据，请将`显示阅读连续天数`切换开关设为`关闭`状态。

segments.source_content: ## Open Links in a New Tab

When you click a post link on your feed using the `Read post` button, daily.dev will open that post in a new tab by default. To have posts open in the current tab instead, set the `Open links in new tab` toggle switch to `off`.

translations.zh-CN: 当您通过内容流中的`阅读文章`按钮点击链接时，daily.dev默认会在新标签页打开文章。如需在当前标签页打开，请将`在新标签页打开链接`切换开关设为`关闭`状态。

segments.source_content: ## Show Custom Shortcuts
Enable this option to access custom shortcuts at the top center of your feed.

translations.zh-CN: 启用此选项后，您可以在内容流顶部中央区域访问自定义快捷方式。

segments.source_content: ![Enable custom shortcuts on daily.dev](https://daily-now-res.cloudinary.com/image/upload/v1724399755/docs-v2/dfd3d9aa-1cec-4d0d-b340-0913c8b9ea6b.png)
## Show Feed Sorting Menu
Turning this toggle switch on adds a dropdown menu to the My Feed and Popular Feed sections, enabling sorting by `Date` or by `Recommended`, as shown below:

translations.zh-CN: 开启此切换开关后，"我的内容流"和"热门内容流"区域将添加下拉菜单，支持按`日期`或`推荐`排序，如下图所示：

segments.source_content: ![Feed sorting menu on daily.dev](https://daily-now-res.cloudinary.com/image/upload/v1724399859/docs-v2/ea9b06cd-b59c-4ccb-a420-cda7bba7e75e.png)
## Enable Companion Widget
Switching this toggle to `on` activates the [companion widget for daily.dev](https://docs.daily.dev/docs/key-features/the-companion), while setting it to `off` deactivates the widget.

translations.zh-CN: 将此开关切换至`开启`可激活[daily.dev伴侣组件](https://docs.daily.dev/docs/key-features/the-companion)，切换至`关闭`则停用该组件。

segments.source_content: The companion widget enhances your experience by allowing you to bookmark, comment, and upvote directly on the original post. To activate this widget, click on the **companion button** in the top-right corner of the daily.dev menu bar, as seen below:

translations.zh-CN: 伴侣组件能增强您的使用体验，支持直接在原文页面进行收藏、评论和点赞操作。要激活该组件，请点击daily.dev菜单栏右上角的**伴侣按钮**，如下图所示：

segments.source_content: ![Companion widget activation icon on daily.dev](https://daily-now-res.cloudinary.com/image/upload/v1695752806/docs-v2/Companion-widget-icon.png)
Then click on the `Activate companion` button in the description box:

translations.zh-CN: 然后在描述框中点击`激活伴侣`按钮：

segments.source_content: ![Activate companion widget on daily.dev](https://daily-now-res.cloudinary.com/image/upload/v1695752390/docs-v2/Activate-companion.png)
You will then be asked to grant additional permissions to display the companion widget directly on the original post.

translations.zh-CN: 系统随后会要求授予额外权限，以便在原文页面直接显示伴侣组件。
